overview:
Billy Hume is a Grammy-nominated, Gold and Platinum selling music producer, mixer and songwriter based in Atlanta, Ga.

He has over 30 years of music business experience. Billy is a past Governor for the Atlanta Chapter of The Recording Academy Board. In 2008, at the ASCAP Pop Awards in Los Angeles, Billy Hume was awarded a Pop Music and Rhythm & Soul Music Award as a songwriter for one of the Top 50 songs of 2007.

He is currently starting a new company, Radiator Music, which is in the business of creating musical, video and other content enhanced eBooks.
